content:
That folder which is now grey and italised has been given a 'no-select' flag. It means that greyed folder can contain other folders which contain emails, but it cannot contain any emails itself.

Is this a gmail account ?
creator: Toad-Hall

content:
If this is a gmail account:

  • please logon to gmail webmail account via a browser
  • select 'Settings'
  • select 'See all settings'
  • Select 'labels'

scroll down to the section which shows all the 'labels' you have created. Lets say you have a top level folder called 'Clients' which is greyed out and it contains a folder called 'Bob' which looks normal. Do you have something like this: [Gmail]/Clients > Bob then: both Clients and Bob will be normal (selectable) folders In imap like this: Clients > Bob

But if you have this: [Gmail]/Clients > [Clients]/Bob

Then in imap you will see this: Clients > [Clients] - this shows as italic font and greyed. > > Bob

Can you post an image which shows what you see in webmail for all those folders you created. Also post an image showing the fodler Pane, so I can see which folder is effected and compare to what you have in gmail webmail.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: right click the folder, select properties and then the repair button.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Exit Thunderbird Access Firewall - which may be part of Windows Defender or controlled by another Anti-Virus Is Thunderbird set up as an allowed program? Please make sure Thunderbird is set up as an allowed program.

content: Do you see all the mail accounts and folders listed in the Folder Pane ?

content:
Please check to see if you have Unified folders enabled - suggest you disable it and use 'All' in order to check all is there.

View > Folders > 'All'

content: There have been no changes to filters that I am aware of. Mine all work. But I do not have an antivirus scanning changed files in my profile folder either. Do you?

content: Ciao, non ho letto altre segnalazioni simili, ma questo non esclude che possa trattarsi di un bug. L'account è di tipo POP3 o IMAP? Accedi allo stesso account da altri dispositivi (browser, app, smartphone...) A quale provider fa capo l'indirizzo email in questione?
creator: @next

content: Ciao, intanto grazie dell'attenzione. Nella mia organizzazione siamo almeno in 3 ad avere lo stesso problema: l'account è IMAP, gli indirizzi email fanno capo all'Università di Pisa (nome.cognome@unipi.it) sinceramente non saprei dire altro
creator: katia.buccella

content: Why would you be looking for a supernova guide? Email sending has remained essentially unchanged for around a decade. You might want to search settings for sending and change the Send format to both HTML and Text from the default conversion to plain text unless you add some styling.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
V mnohých prípadoch pomôže opraviť priečinok, - kliknite na priečinok pravým tlačidlom myši a zvoľte "Vlastnosti" a vyberte "Opraviť priečinok": http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/09/23/Thunderbird_opravit_priecinok.jpg - postupne opravte aj ostatné priečinky

Potom je nutné "Vykonať údržbu priečinkov": - Thunderbird - Súbor - Vykonať údržbu priečinkov http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/19/Thunderbird_udrzba_priecinkov.jpg

Ak to nepomohlo, tak skúste ešte spustiť THUNDERBIRD V NÚDZOVOM REŽIME a preverte či chyba pretrváva (držte klávesu SHIFT pri spustení Thunderbirdu). http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/23/Thunderbird_nudzovy_rezim.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content: Nel vecchio PC avevi configurato un account POP o IMAP? Inoltre, quale procedura di importazione hai seguito?
creator: @next

content:
What information a DSN request returns is up to the receiving server. Most are simply turned off due to the servers being flagged as spammer for contributing backscatter with their DSN's

If you expect media outlets to have DSN enabled you will most likely be very disappointed. It would be one of the things they would disable as part of protecting their sources.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Do you have the account selected in the list above the button?
creator: MattAuSupport
